translated: The Paṭṭhāna🔽The order of the ideas, the reverse order, the triplets, the dyads, the Paṭṭhāna text

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.39. Micchattaniyatattika, Hetuduka🔽Micchattaniyataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  micchat ta niya ta ttika hetu duka  micchatta niyatam hetum dhammam paṭicca na micchatta niyataḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa
translated: The triad of the ideas that are subject to wrongness, the dyad of causes🔽With a cause that is subject to wrongness as condition, an idea that is not subject to wrongness and that has no cause arises through a condition being a cause. (In brief.) In the cause there are thirteen, in the object nine, … in the prenascence seven, … in the postnascence three, … in the repetition three, … in the nongrasping three, … in the dissociation three, … in the association three, … in the presence three, … in the absence three, … in the nonappearance three, … in the disappearance three, … in the nonapparition three, … in the nonreappearance three, … in the privation three, … in the nonprivation thirteen, … in the root-cause three, … in the condition three.

original: Micchattaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: micchatta niyatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sammatta niyataḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
translated: With an idea that has no cause and is not subject to wrongness as condition, an idea that is not subject to wrongness and has no cause arises through a condition being a cause. (In brief.) In the cause there are nine, … in the object nine, … in the prenascence nine, … in the postnascence three, … in the repetition three, … in the nongrasping three, … in the dissociation three, … in the association three, … in the presence three, … in the absence three, … in the nonappearance three, … in the disappearance three, … in the nonapparition three, … in the nonreappearance three, … in the privation three, … in the nonprivation nine, … in the root-cause three, … in the condition three.
